```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(compareGroups)
library(gmodels)
library(ggmosaic)
source("grafics.R", encoding = "UTF-8")
```

# Base de dades original

```{r}
df = read.csv("bbdd_neta.csv")
df$hospital = as.factor(df$hospital)
df$Mort = relevel(df$Mort, "No")
df$Severitat = factor(df$Severitat, levels = c("Mild", "Severe", "Death"))
```

```{r}
df$distance = NULL
df$weights = NULL
df$subclass = NULL
```

```{r}
descrTable(Severitat ~ ., df[, -1])
```

```{r}
CrossTable(df$Estatines, df$Mort, chisq = T)
```

```{r}
ggplot(df) + 
  geom_mosaic(aes(x = product(Severitat, Estatines), fill = Severitat)) + 
  xlab("Estatines") + 
  ylab("Severitat") + 
  theme_bw()
```


## Edat

```{r}
diag_caixes_sev(df, "Edat")
```
